pages.text:
About Us
Breakfast is served with an upscale twist (by the way, you can get great Mimosas and Bloody Marys with your breakfast). Lunch and Dinner menus offer an extensive mix of Tapas Appetizers, Gourmet Pizzas, Signature Paninis, Burgers and Salads. Enjoy the Freshest Seafood on the beach, including “en papillote.” Our award winning menu offers a culinary tour of the world’s best flavors all in one friendly café!
Map and Directions
Restaurant Location:
490 Mandalay Avenue
Clearwater FL 33767
Phone:
(727) 442-3684
Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner  EVERYDAY
Call today to be added to our call-ahead Dinner seating list! While this does not guarantee your space will be available immediately it does provide you with the next available table and ensures that we are able to plan accordingly to provide the best experience to all guests
CALL
727-442-3684
TODAY!
Map & Directions
Community Involvement
We love to make a difference in our community.
Clearwater Beach Chamber of Commerce | Clearwater Regional Chamber of Commerce | Clearwater Marine Aquarium | Friends of Art – Artistic Tastings-Donation to Clearwater Regional Chamber of Commerce & Clearwater Arts Foundation | Martini & Matese-Art Foundation Restaurant Week-Donation to Clearwater Aquarium | RCS Food Bank-Ongoing community service | National Information Officers Association Community Schools-Clearwater, Palm Harbor-Continued donations for specified events | St Celia School | UParc | Big Brothers/Sisters  | Clearwater Library | Loving Pet Care | Morning Star School
Visit Our Other 2 Fine Restaurants
Visit Clear Sky on Cleveland
Visit Clear Sky Draught Haus
What People are Saying
Beautiful location steps from the beach. We always have great food and service. The management and servers truly care about their customers experience. I believe this makes any restaurant thrive. I’m looking forward to the future of this great establishment. Now with 3 locations makes it a favorite wherever I am. From my first visit I became a regular. This is a place I’m proud to bring any visiting friends and family.
Robert S
,
Local Guide
fusion-row
